articles.author: John Ely Senior, Emily Craig
articles.title: Men have greater cancer risk because of biology NOT because they drink and smoke more, study claims - Daily Mail
articles.description: The study looked at 300,000 middle-aged Americans over 15 years. Men were more than twice as likely to develop the disease - even when lifestyle factors were ruled out.
articles.content:
Men drink and smoke more than women but that is not the reason they have a higher cancer risk.
A major study suggests biological differences are the real reason behind the disparity between sexes. … [+8778 chars]

articles.author: ZAI KAMAL
articles.title: It's Doctor Michelle Yeoh: Malaysian actress set to receive AFI Honorary Degree - The Star Online
articles.description: Yeoh will be conferred with a Doctorate Of Fine Arts by the American Film Institute (AFI) on Aug13.
articles.content: Malaysian actress Tan Sri Michelle Yeoh will be conferred with a Doctorate Of Fine Arts by the American Film Institute (AFI) for her "contributions of distinction to the art of the moving image", acc… [+926 chars]
